entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers late in the afternoon. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High 8. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries in the evening then clear. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 12 February 2023
